title: Shapeshifters - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/1/19
itunes:title: Shapeshifters - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/1/19
description:
George Noory and author John Kachuba explore his research into the stories of shapeshifters from cultures around the world, where wizards and sorcerers can change from human beings to animals and back again at will.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

itunes:summary: A look at the myths and magic of shapeshifters who can transform from humans to animals.
